main event: Two sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported on 1 Jan 1958 at Tachikawa and Yokata Air Force Bases in Japan.
interesting points: One bright red object flickered and moved in slow motion, while a small dim white object exhibited erratic motion and disappeared behind clouds., The bright red object was observed to be about 2-5 miles away, and the small dim white object about 1/2 mile away., The sightings lasted for about 3 to 5 minutes., Witnesses included airmens observing it from approximately 7:30 to 7:45 PM., The objects were possibly mistaken for a meteor or balloon based on the initial assessments.
sighted object: one bright red object and one small dim white object
